text:
In April 2024, I got a
distress call from my brother.
She's gone, he said.

I just found out
that the last woman

on Earth I could
call a mom had passed

on because the
hospital she was in

didn't have the
medical equipment
to diagnose her properly.

This was my journey into
a world that's, sadly,

the reality of 80,000 Nigerians
and millions in Africa every

year who die as a result of lack
of access to medical equipment--

maybe understandably so,
given the fact that over 70%

of hospitals in
Nigeria lack access
to crucial basic equipment.
Aidra Health is changing this.

We are democratizing
medical equipment access,

ensuring no patient is denied
care because the equipment they
needed was not within reach.

Our digital platform connects
healthcare facilities in need

with those that have excess
and/or idle equipment.

By leveraging
existing resources,

we are increasing accessibility,
improving patient care,

and reducing equipment
costs by up to 50%.

My name is Dr.
David Bunn and this
is my co-founder, Ejiro Maroh.

Together we have assembled
a team with expertise

across healthcare delivery,
strategy, technology
and finance.

Our strong partnerships
position us

to expand across 25 Nigerian
states, impacting thousands

of health care facilities,
and the numerous patients they
serve.

Join Aidra Health as we
transform health delivery

in Africa, ensuring
medical equipment

is positioned when and
where it's needed most--
serving patients.
[APPLAUSE]
